column4: good. Still time." He walked over to a group of pillows in the far corner of the room
column5: and I realized that they had been strewn around a little raised platform of stone.

column1: 1139|11.39|After painstaking ticket-office conversations and timetable consultations
column2: I established with as much certainty as any tourist can hope for that the 11.39 to Paris Est was a service on which accompanied bicycles could be carried free of charge.
